name: Logstash
description: Logstash is great. But the configuration is for non-experts horrible and error prone. Furthermore it consumes a lot more resources than filebeat.

name: Bamboo
description: Jenkins is the main CI tool. Bamboo might integrate well with Jira and Confluence, but the current service provided as it is, doesn't meet our criteria.

name: JPA
description: JPA is for most business cases enough. If it comes to use Oracle DB specifics, the abstraction is counterproductive. Use Jooq for that.

name: Subversion
description: Subversion doesn't support our development approach as much as Git. Migrate asap and as much is possible to Git.

name: dbmaintain
description: Was never a good tool, but isn't actively maintained or developed either. Use flyway.

name: Consul
description: Service Management made easy.

description: Find transactions with amazing speed.

description: Shipping applications in containers is a breeze.

description: Not bad, not free, but mandatory.

description: Load Balancing done right and instantly.

name: Kubernetes

name: Apache Cassandra
description: It's not NoSQL vs. RDBMS, but especially in our business NoSQL might be more appropriate.

name: Github

name: Apache Kafka
description: Stream processing platform

name: Apache Hadoop
description: Going big data needs a framework used for distributed storage and processing of very large data sets

name: CMOMS
description: MQ, instant administration, high available, smart monitoring, I don't think so.

name: JBoss EAP
description: Use Wildfly for Java EE. We don't feel the commercial product and support was needed.

name: RPM
description: While tailoring rpm packages for system configuration is ok, we felt that using it for applications is too error prone. It can crash your system, not done right. Using containers in docker provides isolation and security. Crash your own container.

description: Dependency Injection is a benefit.

name: Patrol
description: Alerting done wrong. Use monit or Watcher.

name: Java EE 6
description: Use Java EE 7

name: Control-M
description: For server management use monit.
